Availability

precautions: Lipirex tablet precautions are following.Before using this medicine, inform the doctor about your past and current medical history. Also, inform the doctor if you are supplements such as herbal supplements.Also, inform the doctor if you have an allergic problem to any of the ingredients present in this medication. But remember, inform the doctor about this issue before taking this medicine. Otherwise, it can cause adverse side effects.People having problems of heart, kidneys should consult the doctor before taking this medicine.Avoid the use of alcohol while taking this medicine.
effects: Lipirex tablet side effects are listed below. Maybe all people do not experience its side effects. Some of its side effects disappear with time as the body adjusts itself to the medicine. But if any of the side effects persist, then immediately seek clinical help and consult the doctor.Lipirex tablet can cause gastrointestinal infection symptoms such as diarrhea. It can also cause problems related to increased transaminases.It can cause some common side effects such as nausea, dry mouth problem, sore throat, and cold containing the symptoms such as the runny or stuffy nose.It can also cause joint pain and insomnia problems.It may also cause a loss of appetite. It can also cause stomach problems such as digestion issues.It can also cause infections such as unary infections and muscle pain or muscle spasms.It may also cause musculoskeletal pain. This pain affects multiple tissues of our body, such as muscles, and joints, and tendons. It can also affect ligaments.Lipirex tablet can also cause limb pain, chest pain known as angina, and pain in the mouth and throat.It can cause lightheadedness, dizziness, and fainting. It can also cause muscle ache and muscle inflammation with or without pain.It may cause difficulty in breathing or a problem of shortness of breath.It can cause severe allergic problems such as allergic reactions or rashes on different parts of a patient’s body.It may cause steven Johnson syndrome problem.Maybe all of the possible side effects related to the Lipirex tablet not described here. Therefore, consult the doctor for more details.

title: Rast 10MG Tab 1x10 (L)
details:
Rast tablets fall under the class of drugs statins. The tablets are also known as lipid regulating agents. It comes with the generic name of Rosuvastatin. The tablets are recommended along with a healthy diet and exercise to reduce bad fat (LDL).

READ MORE
precautions: The comprehensive rast tablets precautions are listed below. It is mandatory to scrutinize all the precautionary measures before usage to avoid adverse effects.Do not use rast tablets if you are hypersensitive to rosuvastatin or any of its inactive ingredients.Inform your doctor of your medical history, previous allergies, and medication you are already using.Notify your doctor if you are a patient of liver or kidney disease.Do not take the tablets if you have prolonged body and muscle pain.Do not use the tablets in case of organ transplantation and using ciclosporins medicine.Notify your doctor if you are already using tablets for lowering cholesterol levels like fibrates.Do not use the tablets without a doctor's prescription if you have a respiratory disorder.Notify your doctor if you are using any antibiotic like fusidic acid to avoid harmful drugs interactions.Do not use the tablets without a doctor's prescription if you are pregnant or planning for it.Do not use the tablets without a doctor's prescription if you are breastfeeding.Avoid taking a high dose of medicine if you have a thyroid problem.Avoid consumption of alcohol.Keep a regular check on your cholesterol level.Keep the medicine away from the reach of children.Place the tablets in cool, dry, and safe place.Use with caution having liver disease, kidney disease and alcohol use.
effects: The potential rast tablet's side effects are listed below. Consult a doctor in case of extreme and prolonged side effects.Nausea.Stomach upset.Dizziness.Vomiting.Trouble breathing.Swelling on face, throat, or lips.Muscle weakness.Constipation.Itching.Elevated urine proteins level. This high level is restored on its own.You might develop diabetes if you are obese or have a high blood sugar level. Extreme side effects include kidney problems and decreased platelets in the blood. Periodic monitoring of blood is recommended.

precautions: The precautions that should be followed while taking the Fenoget capsule are listed below.You should inform the doctor about your medical history before taking Fenoget Capsule.Inform the doctor if you are allergic to any of the ingredients used in Fenoget Capsule Formula.The patients suffering from kidney, liver, and gallbladder should inform before taking Fenoget Capsule treatment.Do not consume alcohol while taking Fenoget Capsule.If the patient is taking drugs that are used to lower the cholesterol, then they should be taken at least 1 hour before taking the Fenoget capsule or 4 to 6 hours after taking Fenoget.Fenoget in pregnancy should be taken if needed or after consultation with your doctor.Fenoget should be stored at room temperature and should be kept away from children and pet’s reach.During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. effects: Fenoget Capsule side effects are:The most common side effects that occur by using Fenoget capsules are nausea, headache, runny nose, indigestion, pain in the back, and muscle pain. But if they persist, consult the doctor.The severe and serious side effects caused by the Fenoget capsule includes liver problem including the symptoms of pale skin, whitening of eyes, etc. it can also cause severe allergic reactions such as skin rashes, itching, swelling on lips, tongue, hands, feet, or in any other part of the body, and blistering of the skin.It can also cause chills, vomiting, and fever.Persistent Nausea/Vomiting, Loss of appetite, Stomach/Abdominal pain, Yellowing Eyes/Skin, Dark urine may occur.

Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist your medical history, especially of cancer, heart disease (such as heart attack, chest pain/angina), stroke, liver disease, kidney disease, organ transplant. Before having surgery, tell your doctor or dentist about all the products you use (including prescription drugs, nonprescription drugs, and herbal products). During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed. Discuss the risks and benefits with your doctor.
effects: Nausea may occur. Febuxostat may rarely cause serious (possibly fatal) liver disease. It may also cause an increase in liver enzymes.
